content: ice moon by fogbound knits easy and quick textured seamless cowl gauge 13 stitches in 4 inches of pattern stitch measurements approximately 50 around and 8 tall after blocking materials  280 yards of bulky yarn sample was knit in miss babs k2 100% merino  us 10/6 mm circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge a 32 length works well  stitch marker s  tapestry needle for weaving in ends notes circumference can be adjusted by adding or subtracting multiples of 10 from the cast-on height can be varied by knitting more or fewer pattern repeats changes in stitches row or gauge will affect your yardage use markers between pattern repeats if necessary or maybe every other repeat ice moon © 2021 by laura aylor all rights reserved page 1 abbreviations repeat k knit p purl pm place marker instructions cast on 160 stitches using the long-tail cast-on pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist purl 2 rounds *rounds 1 & 2 p1 k3 p1 rounds 3 & 4 k5 p2 k1 p2 rounds 5 & 6 p1 k3 p1 rounds 7 & 8 p2 k1 p2 k5 repeat from * 4 more times purl 1 round bind off purl-wise taking care not to bind off tightly use larger needle if necessary chart finishing weave in ends and block as desired pattern support email contact@fogboundknits com ravelry group http //www ravelry com/groups/fogbound-knits ravelry shop http //www ravelry com/designers/laura-aylor follow me on instagram https //www instagram com/fogboundknits/ ice moon © 2021 by laura aylor all rights reserved page 2
